item.title: CsRAX1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_6G014240 Gene Symbol: CsRAX1 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsRAXs negatively regulate leaf size and fruiting ability through auxin glycosylation in cucumber.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_3G036040 Gene Symbol: CsRAX2 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsRAXs negatively regulate leaf size and fruiting ability through auxin glycosylation in cucumber.

item.title: CsRAX5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_UNG046320 Gene Symbol: CsRAX5 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 5 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsRAXs negatively regulate leaf size and fruiting ability through auxin glycosylation in cucumber.

item.title: CsUGT84J2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA000239 Gene Symbol: CsUGT84J2 Gene Name: Al-induced glycosyltransferase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Found that flavonol glycoside levels in tea roots increased following Al treatment, and the Al-induced UDP glycosyltransferase CsUGT84J2 was involved in this mechanism.

item.title: DcMYB113
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_008994 Gene Symbol: DcMYB113 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 113 Genome: carrot genome (V2.

item.title: DcMYB7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_010745 Gene Symbol: DcMYB7 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 7 Genome: DH1 (orange) carrot genome Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: Changing Carrot Color: Insertions in DcMYB7 Alter the Regulation of Anthocyanin Biosynthesis and Modification1.

item.title: F3GGT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: F3GGT1 Gene Name: anthocyanidin 3-O-galactoside-2′’-O-xylosyltransferase Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterisation of F3GT1 and F3GGT1, two glycosyltransferases responsible for anthocyanin biosynthesis in red-fleshed kiwifruit.

item.title: F3GT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: F3GT1 Gene Name: flavonoid 3-0-galactosyltransferase1 Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterisation of F3GT1 and F3GGT1, two glycosyltransferases responsible for anthocyanin biosynthesis in red-fleshed kiwifruit.

item.title: GhGalT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_62126 Gene Symbol: GhGalT1 Gene Name: β-galactosyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A gene (GhGalT1) encoding a putative β-1,3-galactosyltransferase (GalT) was identified in cotton.

item.title: GmPAP15a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmPAP15a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Impaired glycosylation of GmPAP15a, a root-associated purple acid phosphatase, inhibits extracellular phytate-P utilization in soybean.
